verses.verse: לְדָוִ֨ד ׀ <S%H1732><s%> [A Psalm] of David אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּתְחַ֥ר <S%H2734><s%> Fret בַּמְּרֵעִ֑ים <S%H7489><s%> not thyself because of evildoers אַל־ <S%H408><s%> be not תְּ֝קַנֵּ֗א <S%H7065><s%> neither be thou envious בְּעֹשֵׂ֥י <S%H6213><s%> against the workers עַוְלָֽה׃ <S%H5766><s%> of iniquity

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> like כֶ֭חָצִיר <S%H2682><s%> like the grass מְהֵרָ֣ה <S%H4120><s%> For they shall soon יִמָּ֑לוּ <S%H5243><s%> be cut down וּכְיֶ֥רֶק <S%H3418><s%> as the green דֶּ֝֗שֶׁא <S%H1877><s%> herb יִבּוֹלֽוּן׃ <S%H5034><s%> and wither

בְּטַ֣ח <S%H982><s%> Trust בַּֽ֭יהוָה <S%H3068><s%> in the LORD וַעֲשֵׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> and do ט֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> good שְׁכָן־ <S%H7931><s%> [so] shalt thou dwell אֶ֝֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land וּרְעֵ֥ה <S%H7462><s%> thou shalt be fed אֱמוּנָֽה׃ <S%H530><s%> and verily

וְהִתְעַנַּ֥ג <S%H6026><s%> Delight עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> thyself also in the LORD וְיִֽתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> and he shall give לְ֝ךָ֗ מִשְׁאֲלֹ֥ת <S%H4862><s%> thee the desires לִבֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H3820><s%> of thine heart

גּ֣וֹל <S%H1556><s%> Commit עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD דַּרְכֶּ֑ךָ <S%H1870><s%> thy way וּבְטַ֥ח <S%H982><s%> trust עָ֝לָ֗יו <S%H5921><s%> and וְה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> and He יַעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <S%H6213><s%> also in him and he shall bring [it] to pass

וְהוֹצִ֣יא <S%H3318><s%> And he shall bring forth כָא֣וֹר <S%H216><s%> as the light צִדְקֶ֑ךָ <S%H6664><s%> thy righteousness וּ֝מִשְׁפָּטֶ֗ךָ <S%H4941><s%> and thy judgment כַּֽצָּהֳרָֽיִם׃ <S%H6672><s%> as the noonday

דּ֤וֹם ׀ <S%H1826><s%> Rest לַיהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> in the LORD וְהִתְח֪וֹלֵ֫ל <S%H2342><s%> and wait patiently ל֥וֹ אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּ֭תְחַר <S%H2734><s%> for him fret בְּמַצְלִ֣יחַ <S%H6743><s%> not thyself because of him who prospereth דַּרְכּ֑וֹ <S%H1870><s%> in his way בְּ֝אִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> because of the man עֹשֶׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> to pass מְזִמּֽוֹת׃ <S%H4209><s%> wicked devices

הֶ֣רֶף <S%H7503><s%> Cease מֵ֭אַף <S%H639><s%> from anger וַעֲזֹ֣ב <S%H5800><s%> and forsake חֵמָ֑ה <S%H2534><s%> wrath אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּ֝תְחַ֗ר <S%H2734><s%> fret אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> not thyself in any wise לְהָרֵֽעַ׃ <S%H7489><s%> to do evil

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For מְ֭רֵעִים <S%H7489><s%> For evildoers יִכָּרֵת֑וּן <S%H3772><s%> shall be cut off וְקֹוֵ֥י <S%H6960><s%> but those that wait יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> upon the LORD הֵ֣מָּה <S%H1992><s%> they יִֽירְשׁוּ־ <S%H3423><s%> they shall inherit אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> the earth

וְע֣וֹד <S%H5750><s%> Yet מְ֭עַט <S%H4592><s%> For yet a little while וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> will be no רָשָׁ֑ע <S%H7563><s%> and the wicked וְהִתְבּוֹנַ֖נְתָּ <S%H995><s%> [shall] not [be] yea thou shalt diligently consider עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for מְקוֹמ֣וֹ <S%H4725><s%> his place וְאֵינֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H369><s%> more

וַעֲנָוִ֥ים <S%H6035><s%> But the meek יִֽירְשׁוּ־ <S%H3423><s%> shall inherit אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the earth וְ֝הִתְעַנְּג֗וּ <S%H6026><s%> and shall delight עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in רֹ֥ב <S%H7230><s%> themselves in the abundance שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <S%H7965><s%> of peace

זֹמֵ֣ם <S%H2161><s%> plotteth רָ֭שָׁע <S%H7563><s%> The wicked לַצַּדִּ֑יק <S%H6662><s%> against the just וְחֹרֵ֖ק <S%H2786><s%> and gnasheth עָלָ֣יו <S%H5921><s%> with שִׁנָּֽיו׃ <S%H8127><s%> upon him with his teeth

אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> The Lord יִשְׂחַק־ <S%H7832><s%> shall laugh ל֑וֹ כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for רָ֝אָ֗ה <S%H7200><s%> at him for he seeth כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יָבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> is coming יוֹמֽוֹ׃ <S%H3117><s%> that his day

חֶ֤רֶב ׀ <S%H2719><s%> the sword פָּֽתְח֣וּ <S%H6605><s%> have drawn out רְשָׁעִים֮ <S%H7563><s%> The wicked וְדָרְכ֪וּ <S%H1869><s%> and have bent קַ֫שְׁתָּ֥ם <S%H7198><s%> their bow לְ֭הַפִּיל <S%H5307><s%> to cast down עָנִ֣י <S%H6041><s%> the poor וְאֶבְי֑וֹן <S%H34><s%> and needy לִ֝טְב֗וֹחַ <S%H2873><s%> [and] to slay יִשְׁרֵי־ <S%H3477><s%> such as be of upright דָֽרֶךְ׃ <S%H1870><s%> conversation

חַ֭רְבָּם <S%H2719><s%> Their sword תָּב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> shall enter בְלִבָּ֑ם <S%H3820><s%> into their own heart וְ֝קַשְּׁתוֹתָ֗ם <S%H7198><s%> and their bows תִּשָּׁבַֽרְנָה׃ <S%H7665><s%> shall be broken

טוֹב־ <S%H2896><s%> hath [is] better מְ֭עַט <S%H4592><s%> A little לַצַּדִּ֑יק <S%H6662><s%> that a righteous man מֵ֝הֲמ֗וֹן <S%H1995><s%> than the riches רְשָׁעִ֥ים <S%H7563><s%> wicked רַבִּֽים׃ <S%H7227><s%> of many

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> For זְרוֹע֣וֹת <S%H2220><s%> For the arms רְ֭שָׁעִים <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked תִּשָּׁבַ֑רְנָה <S%H7665><s%> shall be broken וְסוֹמֵ֖ךְ <S%H5564><s%> upholdeth צַדִּיקִ֣ים <S%H6662><s%> the righteous יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> but the LORD

יוֹדֵ֣עַ <S%H3045><s%> knoweth יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD יְמֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> the days תְמִימִ֑ם <S%H8549><s%> of the upright וְ֝נַחֲלָתָ֗ם <S%H5159><s%> and their inheritance לְעוֹלָ֥ם <S%H5769><s%> shall be for ever תִּהְיֶֽה׃ <S%H1961><s%> become

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יֵ֭בֹשׁוּ <S%H954><s%> They shall not be ashamed בְּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> time רָעָ֑ה <S%H7451><s%> in the evil וּבִימֵ֖י <S%H3117><s%> and in the days רְעָב֣וֹן <S%H7459><s%> of famine יִשְׂבָּֽעוּ׃ <S%H7646><s%> they shall be satisfied

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> But רְשָׁעִ֨ים ׀ <S%H7563><s%> But the wicked יֹאבֵ֗דוּ <S%H6><s%> shall perish וְאֹיְבֵ֣י <S%H341><s%> and the enemies יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כִּיקַ֣ר <S%H3368><s%> [shall be] as the fat כָּרִ֑ים <S%H3733><s%> of lambs כָּל֖וּ <S%H3615><s%> they shall consume בֶעָשָׁ֣ן <S%H6227><s%> into smoke כָּֽלוּ׃ <S%H3615><s%> shall they consume away

לֹוֶ֣ה <S%H3867><s%> borroweth רָ֭שָׁע <S%H7563><s%> The wicked וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and does not יְשַׁלֵּ֑ם <S%H7999><s%> and payeth not again וְ֝צַדִּ֗יק <S%H6662><s%> but the righteous חוֹנֵ֥ן <S%H2603><s%> sheweth mercy וְנוֹתֵֽן׃ <S%H5414><s%> and giveth

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for מְ֭בֹרָכָיו <S%H1288><s%> For [such as be] blessed יִ֣ירְשׁוּ <S%H3423><s%> of him shall inherit אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the earth וּ֝מְקֻלָּלָ֗יו <S%H7043><s%> and [they that be] cursed יִכָּרֵֽתוּ׃ <S%H3772><s%> of him shall be cut off

מֵ֭יְהוָה <S%H3068><s%> by the LORD מִֽצְעֲדֵי־ <S%H4703><s%> The steps גֶ֥בֶר <S%H1397><s%> of a [good] man כּוֹנָ֗נוּ <S%H3559><s%> are ordered וְדַרְכּ֥וֹ <S%H1870><s%> in his way יֶחְפָּֽץ׃ <S%H2654><s%> and he delighteth

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> When יִפֹּ֥ל <S%H5307><s%> Though he fall לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יוּטָ֑ל <S%H2904><s%> he shall not be utterly cast down כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD סוֹמֵ֥ךְ <S%H5564><s%> upholdeth יָדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3027><s%> [him with] his hand

נַ֤עַר ׀ <S%H5288><s%> I have been young הָיִ֗יתִי <S%H1961><s%> have been גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> and now זָ֫קַ֥נְתִּי <S%H2204><s%> and [now] am old וְֽלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not רָ֭אִיתִי <S%H7200><s%> yet have I not seen צַדִּ֣יק <S%H6662><s%> the righteous נֶעֱזָ֑ב <S%H5800><s%> forsaken וְ֝זַרְע֗וֹ <S%H2233><s%> nor his seed מְבַקֶּשׁ־ <S%H1245><s%> begging לָֽחֶם׃ <S%H3899><s%> bread

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All הַ֭יּוֹם <S%H3117><s%> [He is] ever חוֹנֵ֣ן <S%H2603><s%> merciful וּמַלְוֶ֑ה <S%H3867><s%> and lendeth וְ֝זַרְע֗וֹ <S%H2233><s%> and his seed לִבְרָכָֽה׃ <S%H1293><s%> [is] blessed
ס֣וּר <S%H5493><s%> Depart מֵ֭רָע <S%H7451><s%> from evil וַעֲשֵׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> and do ט֗וֹב <S%H2896><s%> good וּשְׁכֹ֥ן <S%H7931><s%> and dwell לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> for evermore

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> For יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> For the LORD אֹ֘הֵ֤ב <S%H157><s%> loveth מִשְׁפָּ֗ט <S%H4941><s%> judgment וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> and does not יַעֲזֹ֣ב <S%H5800><s%> and forsaketh אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֲ֭סִידָיו <S%H2623><s%> not his saints לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever נִשְׁמָ֑רוּ <S%H8104><s%> they are preserved וְזֶ֖רַע <S%H2233><s%> but the seed רְשָׁעִ֣ים <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked נִכְרָֽת׃ <S%H3772><s%> shall be cut off

צַדִּיקִ֥ים <S%H6662><s%> The righteous יִֽירְשׁוּ־ <S%H3423><s%> shall inherit אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land וְיִשְׁכְּנ֖וּ <S%H7931><s%> and dwell לָעַ֣ד <S%H5703><s%> therein for ever עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

פִּֽי־ <S%H6310><s%> The mouth צַ֭דִּיק <S%H6662><s%> of the righteous יֶהְגֶּ֣ה <S%H1897><s%> speaketh חָכְמָ֑ה <S%H2451><s%> wisdom וּ֝לְשׁוֹנ֗וֹ <S%H3956><s%> and his tongue תְּדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> talketh מִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <S%H4941><s%> of judgment

תּוֹרַ֣ת <S%H8451><s%> The law אֱלֹהָ֣יו <S%H430><s%> of his God בְּלִבּ֑וֹ <S%H3820><s%> [is] in his heart לֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> not תִמְעַ֣ד <S%H4571><s%> shall slide אֲשֻׁרָֽיו׃ <S%H838><s%> none of his steps
צוֹפֶ֣ה <S%H6822><s%> watcheth רָ֭שָׁע <S%H7563><s%> The wicked לַצַּדִּ֑יק <S%H6662><s%> the righteous וּ֝מְבַקֵּ֗שׁ <S%H1245><s%> and seeketh לַהֲמִיתוֹ׃ <S%H4191><s%> to slay

יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> will not יַעַזְבֶ֣נּוּ <S%H5800><s%> will not leave בְיָד֑וֹ <S%H3027><s%> him in his hand וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יַ֝רְשִׁיעֶ֗נּוּ <S%H7561><s%> nor condemn בְּהִשָּׁפְטֽוֹ׃ <S%H8199><s%> him when he is judged

קַוֵּ֤ה <S%H6960><s%> Wait אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> for יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> on the LORD וּשְׁמֹ֬ר <S%H8104><s%> and keep דַּרְכּ֗וֹ <S%H1870><s%> his way וִֽ֭ירוֹמִמְךָ <S%H7311><s%> and he shall exalt לָרֶ֣שֶׁת <S%H3423><s%> thee to inherit אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land בְּהִכָּרֵ֖ת <S%H3772><s%> are cut off רְשָׁעִ֣ים <S%H7563><s%> when the wicked תִּרְאֶֽה׃ <S%H7200><s%> thou shalt see

רָ֭אִיתִי <S%H7200><s%> I have seen רָשָׁ֣ע <S%H7563><s%> the wicked עָרִ֑יץ <S%H6184><s%> in great power וּ֝מִתְעָרֶ֗ה <S%H6168><s%> and spreading כְּאֶזְרָ֥ח <S%H249><s%> bay tree רַעֲנָֽן׃ <S%H7488><s%> himself like a green

וַ֭יַּֽעֲבֹר <S%H5674><s%> Yet he passed away וְהִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> and lo אֵינֶ֑נּוּ <S%H369><s%> was no וָֽ֝אֲבַקְשֵׁ֗הוּ <S%H1245><s%> and lo he [was] not yea I sought וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> could נִמְצָֽא׃ <S%H4672><s%> him but he could not be found

שְׁמָר־ <S%H8104><s%> Mark תָּ֭ם <S%H8535><s%> the perfect וּרְאֵ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> [man] and behold יָשָׁ֑ר <S%H3477><s%> the upright כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אַחֲרִ֖ית <S%H319><s%> for the end לְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> of [that] man שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <S%H7965><s%> [is] peace

וּֽ֭פֹשְׁעִים <S%H6586><s%> But the transgressors נִשְׁמְד֣וּ <S%H8045><s%> shall be destroyed יַחְדָּ֑ו <S%H3162><s%> together אַחֲרִ֖ית <S%H319><s%> the end רְשָׁעִ֣ים <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked נִכְרָֽתָה׃ <S%H3772><s%> shall be cut off

וּתְשׁוּעַ֣ת <S%H8668><s%> But the salvation צַ֭דִּיקִים <S%H6662><s%> of the righteous מֵיְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> [is] of the LORD מָֽ֝עוּזָּ֗ם <S%H4581><s%> [he is] their strength בְּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> in the time צָרָֽה׃ <S%H6869><s%> of trouble

וַֽיַּעְזְרֵ֥ם <S%H5826><s%> shall help יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD וַֽיְפַ֫לְּטֵ֥ם <S%H6403><s%> them and deliver יְפַלְּטֵ֣ם <S%H6403><s%> them he shall deliver מֵ֭רְשָׁעִים <S%H7563><s%> them from the wicked וְיוֹשִׁיעֵ֑ם <S%H3467><s%> and save כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because חָ֥סוּ <S%H2620><s%> them because they trust בֽוֹ׃
